translations: 退缩，畏缩；厌恶，反感；感到难堪，觉得难为情

sentences.sentence: How the word made the leap from "someone who makes you want to cuddle" to "someone who makes you cringe" isn't really known but there are a few enticing clues.
sentences.translation: 这个词是如何从“一个让你想要拥抱的人”变成“一个让你畏缩的人”，我们不得而知，但其中有一些诱人的线索。

sentences.sentence: I cringe when I think of the poems I wrote then.
sentences.translation: 每当我想起我那时写的诗歌就感到很难堪。

sentences.sentence: I cringe when I think of the risks I took.
sentences.translation: 当我想到我承担的风险时，我也会害怕。
